internalName: ASQ-4m communication: Does your baby chuckle softly?

label.ch: 宝宝会轻笑吗？
label.en: Does your baby chuckle softly?

internalName: ASQ-4m communication: After you have been out of sight, does your baby smile or get excited when he sees you?

label.ch: 在您看不见了之后，宝宝看到他时会微笑还是会兴奋？
label.en: After you have been out of sight, does your baby smile or get excited when he sees you?

internalName: ASQ-4m communication: Does your baby stop crying when she hears a voice other than yours?

label.ch: 当宝宝听到您以外的声音时，您的宝宝会停止哭泣吗？
label.en: Does your baby stop crying when she hears a voice other than yours?

internalName: ASQ-4m communication: Does your baby make high-pitched squeals?

label.ch: 您的宝宝会发出尖锐的尖叫声吗？
label.en: Does your baby make high-pitched squeals?

internalName: ASQ-4m communication: Does your baby laugh?

label.ch: 宝宝会笑吗？
label.en: Does your baby laugh?

internalName: ASQ-4m communication: Does your baby make sounds when looking at toys or people?

label.ch: 宝宝在看玩具或看人时会发出声音吗？
label.en: Does your baby make sounds when looking at toys or people?

internalName: ASQ-4m gross motor: While your baby is on his back, does he move his head from side to side?

label.ch: 当您的宝宝躺在他的背上时，他会左右移动头吗？
label.en: While your baby is on his back, does he move his head from side to side?

internalName: ASQ-4m gross motor: holding her head up while on her tummy, does your baby lay her head back down on the floor, rather than let it drop or fall forward?

label.ch: 宝宝在肚子上抬起头后，是否将头放回地板上，而不是让它掉落或向前倾？
label.en: After holding her head up while on her tummy, does your baby lay her head back down on the floor, rather than let it drop or fall forward?

internalName: ASQ-4m gross motor: When your baby is on his tummy, does he hold his head up so that his chin is about 3 inches from the floor for at least 15 seconds?

label.ch: 当您的孩子躺在肚子上时，他会抱着他的肚子吗？ 抬起头，使他的下巴距离 至少要停留15秒?
label.en: When your baby is on his tummy, does he hold his head up so that his chin is about 3 inches from the floor for at least 15 seconds?

internalName: ASQ-4m gross motor: When your baby is on her tummy, does she hold her head straight up, looking around? (She can rest on her arms while doing this.)

label.ch: 当您的宝宝躺在肚子上时，她会抬头抬头吗？ （这样做时，她可以放下胳膊。）
label.en: When your baby is on her tummy, does she hold her head straight up, looking around? (She can rest on her arms while doing this.)

internalName: ASQ-4m gross motor: When you hold him in a sitting position, does your baby hold his head steady?

label.ch: 当您将他保持坐姿时，您的宝宝会保持头部稳定吗？
label.en: When you hold him in a sitting position, does your baby hold his head steady?

internalName: ASQ-4m gross motor: While your baby is on her back, does your baby bring her hands together over her chest,touching her fingers?

label.ch: 当您的宝宝仰卧着时，您的宝宝是否将手放在胸部上方并抚摸手指？
label.en: While your baby is on her back, does your baby bring her hands together over her chest,touching her fingers?

internalName: ASQ-4m fine motor:Is your baby’s hand usually tightly closed when he is awake? (If your baby used to do this but no longer does, mark “yes.”)

label.ch: 宝宝清醒时通常会紧紧地握住他的手吗？ （如果您的宝宝曾经这样做但不再这样做，请标记“是”。）
label.en: Is your baby’s hand usually tightly closed when he is awake? (If your baby used to do this but no longer does, mark “yes.”)

internalName: ASQ-4m fine motor:Does your baby grasp your finger if you touch the palm of her hand?

label.ch: 如果您触摸宝宝的手掌，您的宝宝会抓住您的手指吗？
label.en: Does your baby grasp your finger if you touch the palm of her hand?

internalName: ASQ-4m fine motor: When you put a toy in his hand, does your baby hold it in his hand briefly?

label.ch: 当您将玩具放在他的手中时，宝宝会短暂地将其握在手中吗？
label.en: When you put a toy in his hand, does your baby hold it in his hand briefly?

internalName: ASQ-4m fine motor:Does your baby touch her face with her hands?

label.ch: 宝宝会用手触摸她的脸吗？
label.en: Does your baby touch her face with her hands?

internalName: ASQ-4m fine motor:Does your baby hold his hands open or partly open when he is awake (rather than in fists, as they were when he was a newborn)?

label.ch: 宝宝清醒时会握住他的手张开还是部分张开（而不是像刚出生时那样握拳）？
label.en: Does your baby hold his hands open or partly open when he is awake (rather than in fists, as they were when he was a newborn)?

internalName: ASQ-4m fine motor:Does your baby grab or scratch at her clothes?

label.ch: 宝宝会抓或抓她的衣服吗？
label.en: Does your baby grab or scratch at her clothes?

internalName: ASQ-4m problem solving:Does your baby look at objects that are 8–10 inches away?

label.ch: 宝宝会看8到10英寸远的物体吗？
label.en: Does your baby look at objects that are 8–10 inches away?

internalName: When you move around, does your baby follow you with his eyes?

label.ch: 当您四处走动时，您的宝宝会跟随他的眼睛吗？
label.en: When you move around, does your baby follow you with his eyes?

internalName: ASQ-4m problem solving:When you move a toy slowly from side to side in front of your baby’sface (about 10 inches away), does your baby follow the toy with hereyes, sometimes turning her head?

label.ch: 当您在宝宝的脸前（大约10英寸远）从一侧向另一侧缓慢移动玩具时，您的宝宝会带着异视跟随玩具，有时会转过头吗？
label.en: When you move a toy slowly from side to side in front of your baby’sface (about 10 inches away), does your baby follow the toy with hereyes, sometimes turning her head?

internalName: ASQ-4m problem solving:When you move a small toy up and down slowly in front of your baby’sface (about 10 inches away), does your baby follow the toy with his eyes?

label.ch: 当您在宝宝的脸部（大约10英寸远）前面缓慢上下移动一个小玩具时，您的宝宝会用眼睛跟着玩具吗？
label.en: When you move a small toy up and down slowly in front of your baby’sface (about 10 inches away), does your baby follow the toy with his eyes?

internalName: ASQ-4m problem solving:When you hold your baby in a sitt(about the size of a cup or rattle) that you place on the table or floor ining position, does she look at a toy front of her?

label.ch: 当您将婴儿放在桌子或地板上的坐椅（大约杯或摇铃大小）中时，她会看着她的玩具正面吗？
label.en: When you hold your baby in a sitt(about the size of a cup or rattle) that you place on the table or floor ining position, does she look at a toy front of her?

internalName: ASQ-4m problem solving:When you dangle a toy above your baby while heis lying on his back, does he wave his arms toward the toy?

label.ch: 当您躺在婴儿背上的上方悬挂玩具时，他会朝玩具挥动手臂吗？
label.en: When you dangle a toy above your baby while heis lying on his back, does he wave his arms toward the toy?

internalName: ASQ-4m personal social: Does your baby sometimes try to suck, even when she’s not feeding?

label.ch: 即使不喂奶，宝宝有时也会尝试吮吸吗？
label.en: Does your baby sometimes try to suck, even when she’s not feeding?

internalName: ASQ-4m personal social: Does your baby cry when he is hungry, wet, tired, or wants to be held?

label.ch: 宝宝饥饿，潮湿，疲倦或想被抱着时，他会哭吗？
label.en: Does your baby cry when he is hungry, wet, tired, or wants to be held?

internalName: ASQ-4m personal social: Does your baby smile at you?

label.ch: 宝宝对你微笑吗？
label.en: Does your baby smile at you?

internalName: ASQ-4m personal social: When you smile at your baby, does she smile back?

label.ch: 当您对宝宝微笑时，她会回头微笑吗？
label.en: When you smile at your baby, does she smile back?

internalName: ASQ-4m personal social: Does your baby watch his hands?

label.ch: 宝宝会注意他的手吗？
label.en: Does your baby watch his hands?

internalName: ASQ-4m personal social: When your baby sees the breast or bottle, does she seem to know she is about to be fed?

label.ch: 当您的宝宝看到母乳或奶瓶时，她似乎知道自己将要喂奶了吗？
label.en: When your baby sees the breast or bottle, does she seem to know she is about to be fed?
